TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebProxy

Docs.summary: Provides the base interface for implementation of proxy access for the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> interface provides the methods and properties that are required by the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class to access proxy servers.
The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> class is the base implementation of the <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> interface.

block.para: The method can be used to control proxy use based on the destination URI. Use the method to indicate that the proxy should not be used to reach the destination server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::ICredentials ^ Credentials { System::Net::ICredentials ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentials ^ value); };
member this.Credentials : System.Net.ICredentials with get, set

Docs.summary: The credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
Docs.value: An instance that contains the credentials that are needed to authenticate a request to the proxy server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy.Credentials%2A> property is an <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> instance that contains the authorization credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property to set the credentials that will be submitted to the proxy server for authentication.
[!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Uri GetProxy(class System.Uri destination) cil managed
Public Function GetProxy (destination As Uri) As Uri

Docs.param: A that specifies the requested Internet resource.
Docs.summary: Returns the URI of a proxy.
Docs.returns: A instance that contains the URI of the proxy used to contact .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy.GetProxy%2A> method returns the URI of the proxy server that handles requests to the Internet resource that is specified in the `destination` parameter.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetProxy%2A> method to return the URI that the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> uses to access the Internet resource.
[!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsBypassed(class System.Uri host) cil managed
Public Function IsBypassed (host As Uri) As Boolean

Docs.param: The of the host to check for proxy use.
Docs.summary: Indicates that the proxy should not be used for the specified host.
Docs.returns: if the proxy server should not be used for ; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> method indicates whether to use the proxy server to access the host that is specified in the `host` parameter. If <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> is `true`, the proxy is not used to contact the host and the request is passed directly to the server.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> property to determine whether the proxy server should be used for the specified host.
[!code-cpp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CPP/iwebproxy_interface.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/CS/iwebproxy_interface.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IWebProxy_Interface#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IWebProxy_Interface/VB/iwebproxy_interface.vb#4)]
